Name: Solubility relationship
Description: This type connects a potential solvent and solute and whether or not they are soluble, insoluble or miscible with each other.

Properties.Name: Solubility
Properties.Description: Is the substance soluble, insoluble or fully miscible in this solvent?

Properties.Name: Solvent
Properties.Description: The solvent that this substance is soluble, insoluble, or miscible in.

Properties.Name: Solute
Properties.Description: The substance that is soluble, insoluble, or miscible in this solvent.
